programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: RONDA ARTÍSTICA
programme.desc: Se exhibe la diversidad de cantos y danzas, óperas locales tradicionales, música y artes folklóricas de China.

programme.title: AMÉRICA AHORA
programme.desc: Es un programa nuevo del canal, de corte noticioso con estilo de revista, y que se transmite una vez a la semana. Aquí ofrecemos reportajes y análisis en profundidad sobre los temas más debatidos y de mayor actualidad en la zona americana, y en especial en América Latina.

programme.title: DÍALOGO
programme.desc: Convoca a celebridades, eruditos y funcionarios gubernamentales tanto de China como del exterior, para debatir temas de palpitante actualidad e interés general y de proyección internacional.

programme.title: DOCUMENTAL
programme.desc: Presentapersonajes y acontecimientos típicos, avances y descubrimientos tecnológicos y científicos, y la civilización social de China.

programme.title: EL PROYECTOR
programme.desc: Acérquese a la vida de la China antigua y moderna a través de las producciones dramáticas de CGTN-Español. La combinación perfecta de historia y ficción chinas en la pantalla de su televisor.

programme.title: What Could Be Bad: Episode 105 Time to Step Up with Paul Rieckhoff
Hot Topics Power Play: What AI Can Learn from Bitcoin Mining Strategies
programme.desc: Welcome to this episode of the Edge Up Show, where hosts Richard Carthon and Josh Kriger dive deep into the fascinating world of Bitcoin mining and its intersection with gaming and AI. In this episode, we are joined by Christian Davies from Realm, who shares insights on the innovative platform GoMining Miners Wars, which gamifies Bitcoin mining by allowing players to earn real Bitcoin rewards through NFTs and mining clans. We discuss the challenges and opportunities of blending gaming with real-world mining infrastructure and the importance of operational resilience in this emerging space.

programme.title: Bitcoin Las Vegas: Insights from Industry Leaders on the Future of Crypto and Regulation
programme.desc: Welcome to another exciting episode of The Edge of Show, your gateway to the Web3 revolution! In this episode, we are live at Bitcoin Las Vegas, where we dive deep into the world of blockchain, cryptocurrency, and the latest innovations in the digital space.

programme.title: BLACKROCK GOES FULL ETHEREUM! TRUMP $8000 ETH BOMBSHELL!
programme.desc: BlackRock is going full ETH mode and Eric Trump says price should hit $8K soon! We will be getting into this on today's show, plus; altcoin treasury firms, INJ, XRP, HBAR, TRX, memecoins, and more

programme.title: XRP BTC SOL ETH PRICE SQUEEZE! (Time To Get In Before It’s TOO LATE?)
programme.desc: BTC, ETH, XRP, and SOL all dropped in the past 24 hours amid a ‘long squeeze.’ Today on The O Show, I'm going to go through what this means, plus I'll discuss whether it's time to get in before it's too late!

programme.title: Eight Years of Bad! for July 16, 2025
programme.desc: July 16, 2017. A day that will live in infamy. It was the day that Sir Lord Travis Wright and I invaded the beaches of Normandy… no, it was the day that we got on a space shuttle to become astronauts… well, ok. It was the day we decided to say words about Bitcoin, record them, and share them with the world. Perhaps not as epic as one would like, but it was a pretty big deal for us. Now, eight years later, we are the third longest-running Bitcoin podcast in the english language. Is humanity better for it? Probably not. But we’re still here and today we discuss what eight years in this space looks and feels like. Come with us on a walk down memory lane on this crazy crypto ride

Aspen HD
programme.desc: Tag along with Teton Gravity Research on a trip to Colorado, and watch as a crew throws down in Aspen, reaching the point where a jumping over a helicopter on a 95-foot jump is just another day.

programme.title: Mind The Gap
programme.desc: Join TGR and Anthill Films for a behind-the-scenes peek at the production and release of unReal, their 2015 mountain bike film.

programme.title: UTA: The Climb For Kosovo
programme.desc: In 2017, 34 year-old Uta Ibrahimi became the first person from Kosovo to attempt Everest. Born and raised in eastern Kosovo, her childhood was interrupted by a fierce ethnic war that ripped the heart out of the Balkan nation. Battling against Kosovo’s entrenched gender stereotypes and misogyny within the climbing community, Uta climbed the highest peaks in Kosovo, and then Europe.

programme.title: Homegrown Tour Guide
programme.desc: Get to know some of the coolest and most unique characters populating outdoors hubs around the country, and check out local favorite spots along the way.

programme.title: The KFC
programme.desc: The KFC - A Paragliding Adventure in Tanzania. Five Kiwis take a paragliding adventure in Tanzania, with the ultimate aim to fly from the summit of Mt Kilimanjaro.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking in Gaspésie, Québec
programme.desc: A massive and rugged peninsula surrounded by the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, Gaspésie features a dramatic coastline where beautiful wilderness rivers meet the ocean. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks around the iconic Percé Rock and stand up paddleboards the Bonaventure River.

programme.title: Alaska HD
programme.desc: Join Jeremy Jones, Sage Cattabriga-Alosa, Ian McIntosh, and Victoria Jealouse as they head to Alaska. Adverse snow conditions abound, but the experienced team manages to survive.

programme.title: Gunnie Season
programme.desc: The highly anticipated drop of 4bi9 Media’s “Gunnie Season” trailer is finally upon us. This is only 4bi9′s fourth feature length film, but you could consider them veterans in the game now. With a list of some of the top skiers in the world featured in their new film, it will be a must see. I recently sat down with the masterminds behind it all, AJ Dakoulas and Andrew Napier, and their assistant videographer/editor Kevin Steen for an interview about their season, and the making of Gunnie Season.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy
programme.desc: Sewing experts offer easy ways to create neat sewing projects right at home. Viewers of all skill levels learn tips and techniques for creating professional-looking garments, personalized apparel and home accents. Weekly episodes feature various themes, and feature two main projects and one shorter technique segment. Some projects include monogramming napkins and towels; baby poncho, hooded towel and baby-friendly diapers; embellishing yoga pants with a clothing tattoo; and sewing on knits.

programme.title: Perspective
programme.desc: Today's show is all about perspective or how we see objects in space. Perspective is the technique of representing three dimensional objects on a two dimensional space -- like drawing a house on a flat piece of paper. It's all a point of view from which we categorize or measure -- like a tree that gets smaller and smaller as we walk away from it. Our first example is an optical treasure box with geometric patterns. Next, build your own kaleidoscope. Add to your art journal -- how perspective makes buildings and other city scenes more realistic. Finally, make a lightweight ball with streamers and watch it fly through the air and learn about perspective.

programme.desc: A group of individuals discuss a job to take out their enemy, Splashy. They plan to be prepared and get the antidote from their boss. Another individual asks about the whereabouts of Bee and Bow and is told they need a password. Slowy visits with news that Greeny is planning to destroy the bay and river to find silver. The group plans to use persuasion to stop him but is interrupted by the arrival of unknown individuals.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Greeny asks Slowy if theyre ready, but Slowy has just given bad news to Splashy about the bosses wanting to take over their territory. They need to prepare for action and meet at Splashys place. The attackers arrive and give them an ultimatum, but Slowy has a defense system ready.

programme.title: Rescue Mission
programme.desc: The Buster Gang bravely faces a daunting challenge as they encounter a massive meteor hurtling toward Q-Town. Despite their past misdeeds, they are determined to do the right thing and save the community they have come to cherish. However, their efforts are met with skepticism and doubt from those around them. With time running out, the fate of Q-Town hangs in the balance. Will the Buster Gang overcome their past and prove their worth in this crisis?

programme.title: Flashs Resolution
programme.desc: The unexpected thunder and lightning may have caught us off guard, but we must keep pushing forward. Despite Flame and Thunders injuries, Flash remains undeterred. The Buster Gang may have caused destruction, but we have the strength and determination to overcome any obstacle.

programme.title: THE LITTLE THINGS
programme.desc: THE LITTLE THINGS is an indie rom-com with a supernatural twist. It tells the story of Dee (Kathryn Beck), a woman who believes she has the gift to alter peoples destinies... provided she never leaves her home. However, when the possibility of eviction threatens her powers, her only hope is Mitch (Chris Hillier). She affected her first love and the first life with her special gift, but he may not be so willing to help when he finds out his entire life has been manipulated.

programme.title: BIRTHDAY
programme.desc: Ms trade is sex, but sex doesnt sell the way it used to; what clients are searchingis love. M is the highest-paid professional of the many girls at Scarlets, but even on her 25th Birthday, its business as usual. Instead of celebrating, her day is spent answering the silent prayers of Father Phillip. He has lost faith in providing counsel to her colleagues, the vivacious Lily and troubled Cindy. Amidst the many dramas that unfold and the demands of the no-nonsenseScarlet, Ms secret birthday wish goes unanswered, that is, until Joey knocks on her door; a young man, forgotten by the world, who has never learned to love or even how to kiss. But Joey also has a secret, its his Birthday too, and today M might discover that even the slightest, most unexpected wish can come true. Birthday encompasBirthday love, first times, humanity, and the discovery of intimacy in surprising and unexpected places.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 18
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Charlies Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: SPLIT PERSONALITY
programme.desc: A fresh morning in Hotel Kelifornia sees a cheeky Basha stealing a plate full of aaloo bonda and an angry Sundar chasing him out of the shop. The chase leads them to a coconut tree and Basha starts to throw coconuts at Sundar. One of the coconuts misses the target and bounces back hitting Basha on his head. The next moment Bashas whole attitude changes and he becomes a meek and obedient slave to Sundar. Sundar is inexplicably delighted at the exciting turn of events and he put Basha to hard labour in the shop. He is serving, cleaning, pressing Sundars legs, fanning for him and so on. Now Sundar is enjoying his life. But he still has to act all hard working in front of Chai Raja. During one of such charades a steel tumbler falls on Bashas head bringing him back to his real self. An unaware Sundar bosses around soon realizing that his good times have ended. Basha sees so much cleaning and rearranging done in the shop and he himself is too tired. Putting two and two together, it is payback time. And Sundar pays everything back..with interest.

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Hula Hoop
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Monster Madness
programme.desc: When some of the Creepy CandyTM start seeing a mysterious monster lurking in the shadows in the old library, Googly launches an investigation. The others set about creating a trap to catch the monster. What is it? Will Googly solve the mystery? Will they catch it before its too late? Watch the episode of Monster Madness and find out!

programme.title: Never Give Up - Odessa
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Kramazon
programme.desc: Buzz watches Miss Paige order supplies before her vacation online and have it show up the next day. Buzz tells the others and the Creepy Candy hatch a plan to go shopping while Paige is away! Watch the chaos unfold in this hilarious episode when their order is delivered and the party begins!

programme.title: BITTEN BY BUG
programme.desc: Buzz falls head over heels for a mysterious, secret admirer who just moved into the library. Suspicious of her true motives, Googly and Iris try to warn Buzz that he knows nothing about his new friend and that she may not be as nice as she seems, but he ignores their advice. After agreeing to meet his new friend for lunch, Buzz learns the hard way that love can really hurt - literally. Watch the brand new, full episode here and find out how Buzz got a boo boo, and why he needed an emergency ride in an ambulance to see the doctor, in another exciting adventure of Creepy Candy

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: CHARMED, I SAY
programme.desc: Sundar is flipping through old film magazines in his break time when he hears a shriek from right outside the tea shop. Leaning out he sees a woman point at something just at the door. Chai Raja swoops out and in a deft move ensnares whatever it was in a rat-trap. He hands over the small harmless trap to Sundar. Sundar takes the trap and opens it only to find a small benign rattlesnake (female at that!) glide out. The female snake has a fixation on Sundar and follows him back to the hotel, causing havoc in the hotel. For once Sundar has an ally against Basha, but the obsessive snake is more a bane than a boon as Chai Raja is in danger of losing all its customers. Sundar must now tactfully rid the simpering snake off before he too is forced to slither out of the tea shop once and for all.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: ABC Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: GUILLI DANDA
programme.desc: It is a busy day in Hotel Kelifornia and Sundar is busy serving the customer; when a guilli comes and fall on his plate destroying everything. Sundar comes out to see a totally oblivious and excited Basha playing guilli danda with a few kids. Sundar has a mean idea and he innocently joins them in the game. It is his turn to hit the guilli and he intentionally hit is towards Basha who innocently takes it in the spirit. The kids laugh. Sundar does this the second time also. This time the kids laugh and Sundar laughs falling on to the ground. And Sundar runs to the shop with a cheeky laugh like a victor. Basha wants to give it back to Sundar big times. And he decides to play rough. The hotel then faces crazy hits of guillis on food plates, on customers, on Chai Rajas kettle and on Sundars butt. And whenever Chai Raja turns around to see what is going on, Basha makes sure that the guilli ends up in Sundars mouth. The charade gets so crazy that in the end the guilli comes and hits hard on Chai Rajas head. An angry Chai Raja turns around and Sundar quickly pulls Chai Raja to the door to show Basha and gang playing. Basha and the kids freeze seeing Chai Raja with a huge bump on his head holding the guilli. Sundar is excitedly waiting. The next moment Chai Raja takes out his belan and hits the guilli with a smile and joins the team in the game. It is game time and Sundar faints in shock

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: Turn the Paige
programme.desc: Paige Turner is the head librarian at the old Alexander Tyler Poe library. Paige is dedicated, helpful, and very sweet. But when a a mysterious Green Mist appeared one fateful Halloween night, things changed forever at the old library. Find out what strange and creepy things happened to Paige, the janitor, and a forgotten bag of candy!

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Let Go - Jomi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Mewmews Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Dunky's Day in
programme.desc: Dunky has high fever and cannot tolerate any kind of noise. Cat has not had lunch as Dunky is sick… Keet fools him a lot by offering empty glasses for water..

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: Much ado about poo
programme.desc: YOYO visit a park for dogs that is ruined by pooches fouling on the grass which their owners cant be bothered to clear up

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Thunderstorm
programme.desc: The twins help a girl to overcome her fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: BRUSH WITH DANGER
programme.desc: The Guardians can’t believe the Elders are giving them art lessons – HARD art lessons, with lots of criticism! But all the lessons in brushwork pay off when the Guardians apply their new skills to wielding their weapons as they battle a big color-blasting mutant snail sent by….you guessed it!

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Paper Cups
programme.desc: What could our DIY make with a paper cup? Lets find out

programme.title: Knight Racer
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Treasured friends
programme.desc: Ragoo brings a treasure map and the twins find themselves on a desert island were they meet a Pirate with a problem.

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Treehouse Dreams
programme.desc: Odessa designs her own treehouse, but obstacles like no tree get in her way. With a little inspiration from the Zoonicorns, she still finds a way to make her dreams come true. Odessa learns to deal with setbacks in a positive way by being creative and rethinking things, then having the persistence to follow through.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Pinecone
programme.desc: Creativity has no limits, watch Hepi and Briko transform these cones into something lovely

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: Shout
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting to use appropriate voice levels when interacting with others. Outside Voices vs. Inside Voice. (Learn by practicing to) Use the proper volume in the appropriate environments

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Assaf The Magician – Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp”. The Sultan, the PRINCESS’s father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN’s lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: The Magical Flying Horse
programme.desc: The spoilt nephew of the Grand Vizier comes to town and there is a competition to make the boy who has everything something to make him smile for his birthday. When Jamillah asks him what he wants, he asks for a flying horse! Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie do their best to make a flying horse but its beyond Genies powers. In the end Jamillah saves the day by making the boy an origami paper horse with wings that makes him smile.

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Samir and the Sky Lamp
programme.desc: Samir plans to launch a lantern into the sky and measure how far it rises but his experiment is cut short by the Grand Vizier. Mild mannered Samir does not argue with authority and obeys the Grand Viziers orders but Jamillah and Aladdin see the injustice of the situation and convince Samir that he should go ahead with his experiment. Unfortunately taking their advice gets Samir arrested. Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie fly Samirs lamp for him and Samir, spurred on by Jamillah and Aladdins example states his case to the Sultan. Samir is delighted when his bravery is rewarded and the Sultan releases him, it turns out the Sultan is also a man of science and is delighted with Samirs experiment, much to the Grand Viziers annoyance.

programme.title: An Unforgettable Journey - 3 Little Pigs Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the world of fairytales, having been called out by the THREE BEARS. They ask the detective to investigate a fraudulent lottery. They have bought loads of packets of detergent in the hope of winning a cruise, which was the prize in the lottery. But the prize has gone to the 7 LITTLE GOATS and the 3 PIGS, who had only bought one packet each. SANDRA and FO will very soon discover that the whole think is a trap laid by the WOLF to devour the LITTLE GOATS and the PIGS.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: The Golden Key_Based On Hansel & Gretel
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Hansel and Gretel”, called by the WITCH. The magic key to her larder, in which she is holding HANSEL and GRETEL prisoner, has disappeared. SANDRA will have to find the key and deceive the WITCH, in order to be able to help the little brother and sister escape

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: Surprise Day Off
programme.desc: When all the teachers at school are mysteriously absent one day, Fred initially cheerleads his classmates to celebrate. Brains figures out they have been taken away by the potato-brained Potatoids, and she and Fred go off to rescue them.

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: It's Hard Being A Mommy
programme.desc: A baby duck comes out of its eggshell and the first thing it sees is Duda. So, he thinks Duda is his mom! Duda ends up taking care of the baby hoping his mother will come for him soon. But the baby duck is a handful and causes Duda quite a bit of trouble. Duda realizes that it is difficult to take care of a baby. The friends decide to go find the ducks real mother and leave the baby in Scots care. At first, Scot thinks that taking care of the baby is an easy job, but he quickly learns that it is not. Eventually, they find the babys real mother, and its time for Duda to say goodbye. Duda is sad to see the baby duck leaving..

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: El segundo aire
programme.desc: Elena despierta con las manos cubiertas de sangre y su casa en llamas. Ella no puede recordar nada

programme.title: El segundo aire
programme.desc: Elena despierta con las manos cubiertas de sangre y su casa en llamas. Ella no puede recordar nada

programme.title: El segundo aire
programme.desc: Elena despierta con las manos cubiertas de sangre y su casa en llamas. Ella no puede recordar nada

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: Tres chicas se encuentran el día de su 29º cumpleaños y deciden realizar sus sueños antes de cumplir 30 años.

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: Tres amigas buscan encontrar su lugar en el mundo tras experimentar importantes cambios en sus vidas.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Zaki Shan
programme.desc: Director: Wael Ehsaan - Cast: Ahmed Helmy / Yassmin Abd El Aziz - Year of production: 2005

programme.title: Al Qarmoti Fi Ard El Nar
Gawaz Bekaraar Gomhoury
programme.desc: Director: Khaled Youssef - Cast: Hany Ramzy / Hanan Tork - Year of production: 2001

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem956
programme.desc: A nativity story animated with music performed by the Glyndeboume Festival Chorus.

programme.title: I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: Campus Capers 1949
programme.desc: This one features a cat-versus-mouse football game between two cat-and-mouse colleges, called Harbard and Quinceton, and there is nothing Ivy-League about either school. The highlights are a screwy college fight-song and a statute-of-liberty misdirection football play in which the Statute of Liberty participates.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Superman: Destruction Inc.-1942
programme.desc: Superman versus saboteurs at the Metropolis Munitions Plant

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: west of hot dog - stan laurel-ftpencoded3
Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: A Burlesque on Carmen 1915
programme.desc: A gypsy seductress is sent to sway a goofy officer to allow a smuggling run.

programme.title: Managed Money 1934
programme.desc: Young Mary Lou tries to help her brother Sonny raise money so that he can attend a military academy

programme.title: Caught in a Cabaret 1914
programme.desc: Charlie is a clumsy waiter in a cheap cabaret and must endure the strict orders from his boss. He meets a pretty girl in the park and pretends to be a fancy ambassador but must contend with the jealousy of her fiancé.

programme.title: Midnight Manhunt-1945
programme.desc: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.

programme.title: Safety Last!1923
programme.desc: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

programme.desc: When Johnny and Mendez argue, the lights go out, and in the ensuing gunfight Johnny thinks he killed his friend Dick. Now refusing to wear a gun he crosses the border. But it is not long before he runs into Mendez and more trouble.

programme.desc: Steve's pursuit of the elusive Shiras Moose, known as the \"Ghost of Southern Alberta,\" is a culmination of his 12-year quest to complete his North American 29 collection. With dedication and passion, he ventures into the vast wilderness, determined to capture this elusive species on camera

programme.title: BC Borderland Bulls
programme.desc: Embark on BC's wilds with hunters Joe Eppele & Steven Dahn. Tracking majestic elk, witness challenges, camaraderie, & nature's beauty unfold. Join the camaraderie, witness the primal connection with nature, and live the hunt like never before

programme.title: A Decade of Dominance with Steve Ecklund
programme.desc: Celebrate a decade of wilderness exploration with Steve Ecklund, as he marks ten thrilling years of capturing his hunting adventures on film. From rugged landscapes to awe-inspiring encounters, join him in reliving the exhilarating journey of a true outdoorsman

programme.title: Trav’s First BC Black Bear
programme.desc: Travis \"The Timberwolf\", is in BC on a spot and stalk archery black bear hunt. After looking over a ton of bears this season, he has his heart set on taking his first BC black bear with his bow. Being as stealthy as possible Trav and Cheese are able to sneak into 15 yards of the bear and make a great shot. Trav then heads to the kitchen to make a delicious bear ham with the entire hind quarter

programme.title: Late Season Horseback Bulls - Part 1
programme.desc: Join Mitch and Lynn as they head out by horseback on a high country elk hunt after some late season bulls for their 2nd wedding anniversary. The air is thin and cold but the action is hot and heavy. The horses are saddled and the excitement is high as the romantic couple find bulls on almost every ridge top

programme.title: Late Season Horseback Bulls - Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing with their anniversary hunt, Mitch and Lynn are in the high country on an elk hunt in search of late season horseback bulls. With some hunting pressure in the area from other hunters, they move to a new location and find multiple bulls in a high country saddle. With lots of daylight left they wait them out and put a great bull on the ground!

programme.title: Drum Roll
programme.desc: Sandy beaches and driftwood make the perfect spot for wading out into the shallows to kick off spring fishing for freshwater drum. Josh is accompanied by newcomer Joe, and teaches him to navigate the lake in hip waders. In an area ripe with cattails, Josh shows Joe how to harvest and pickle these unsuspected treats

programme.title: Peak Fighting Championship Presents: PFC 40

programme.title: Peak Fighting Championship Presents: PFC 37

programme.title: Peak Fighting Championship Presents: PFC 41
programme.desc: High Level MMA featuring UFC fighter, Julius Walker vs Myron Dennis and more!

programme.title: Guest Tommy Davidson
programme.desc: Tommy Davidson is a legendary comic with a trans son. I did not intend to talk a lot about that — the man is on tour with Katt Williams. I’d planned to talk about comedy and we did that but somehow we kept coming back to talking about his trans son. It’s a very honest conversation.

programme.title: Guest Dr. Psyche Williams-Forson
programme.desc: Dr. Psyche Williams-Forson is the he author of Eating While Black: Food Shaming and Race in America and a leading scholar on Black food studies. Fascinating conversation about Black people, food, and power.

programme.title: Guests Daniella Moodie, Krystal Ball
programme.desc: VP Kamala Harris’s ascension to Presidential nominee is an extraordinary historical moment. I talk with Danielle Moodie and Krystal Ball about what this all means and where we’re going.

programme.title: Highway to Health - Rio Revealed: Paulo Jr. and Cléo Pires Shine at Teva’s Vegan Hotspot
programme.desc: These rockers hit the road to Rio and pick up some incredible talent along the way.

programme.desc: Sherri Johnson & Paige Parsons Roache make scrumptious Raw Walnut Tacos on Plant-Based in the Burbs!

programme.desc: Dr. Kim Williams tells it like it is about what keeps people locked in a unhealthy lifestyle.

programme.title: Best Diet for Healthy Aging
programme.desc: We'd all love to discover the Fountain of Youth. What if it's on your plate?

programme.title: Plant Based in the Burbs - Shroom it with Mushroom Fajitas!
programme.desc: These mushroom fajitas are SO easy to make and so darn delicious. Good for you too.

programme.title: Dynasty Star Elaine Hendrix Tells All!
programme.desc: Dynasty star Elaine Hendrix honored by LCA for her inspiring journey in animal advocacy!

programme.title: What to Say to Vegans
programme.desc: Dr. Melanie Joy, psychologist & bestselling author, explains why vegans are so passionate!

programme.title: Night Action!
programme.desc: UnchainedTV takes you a daring nighttime animal rights mission by Direct Action Everywhere!

programme.title: Ranch Rescue - Storming to Safety!
programme.desc: A Texas ranch turned vegan sanctuary faces a deadly storm—can they save their beloved animals ?

programme.title: From Obese to Super Fit!
programme.desc: This is a journey millions of people want to take and can. Dropkick the weight-loss drugs now!

programme.title: One woman's journey to powerhouse influencer!
programme.desc: Victoria Moran reveals her journey to becoming a best-selling author and powerhouse influencer!

programme.title: A Life-Changing Weight Loss Talk
programme.desc: Drop Pounds the Delicious Way: Dr. Greger’s Ultimate Plant-Based Weight Loss Secrets!

programme.title: Dear Diary
programme.desc: When a psychiatric doctor researches a young girls' diary to find out why she murdered her entire family, he begins to fall into the same state of insomnia and confusion that led her to lose her mind...

programme.title: Doctor Carver
programme.desc: A group of ladies seeking the perfect faces soon realise when they conjure a demonic plastic surgeon, that no surgery comes without a price...

programme.title: The Demon's Child
programme.desc: In search for her missing sister, a young woman takes a job as a nurse to a young boy in a coma and hunts for clues in his sinister family home...

programme.title: Recuérdame
programme.desc: Rose despierta en una casa desconocida tras un grave accidente de coche, con pérdida de memoria y sin poder caminar. Su madre y su novio están allí para ayudarla. Rose quiere reconstruir su vida antes del accidente. No todo es lo que parece...

programme.title: La Maldición de la Sirena
programme.desc: Un joven se enamora de una joven seductora y sensual que conoce en la playa. Cuanto más se enamora de ella, más aprende los peligros de enamorarse de una sirena...

programme.title: Aldea del Vampiro
programme.desc: Rebecca busca a su hermana, una joven periodista desaparecida mientras investigaba una serie de desafortunados sucesos. El rastro la conduce a Timere, un lugar remoto alejado del ajetreo de la vida cotidiana, donde entre el hermético silencio de los habitantes del pueblo crece el temor a que actúen fuerzas oscuras y nadie se atreve a salir de casa por la noche. Aquí Rebecca conoce a un extravagante escritor, al guardián de la iglesia del pueblo y, sobre todo, a Caleb, un hombre encantador, rico y elegante cuya oscura mirada esconde un escalofriante secreto. Es en este pueblo, donde el tiempo parece moverse entre las sombras y el peligro acecha en cada esquina, donde Rebecca se entera de la terrible verdad y comienza la batalla entre el bien y el mal...

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Somos Pobres
programme.desc: Una familia muy pobre espera la Navidad con gran entusiasmo para celebrar y ver lo que les trae Santa Claus. Los niños van al cerro a cortar un árbol y decorarlo para poner los regalos que les traerá su padre después de vender la cosecha. Sin embargo, cuando el padre llega, está borracho y sin dinero, destrozando el árbol y golpeando a sus hijos. Uno de ellos decide huir de casa y, más tarde, entra en el negocio de las drogas.

programme.title: Ámbar "El Color de la Familia Perfecta"
programme.desc: Paúl, actor y cantante, propietario de un bar musical, regresa de Canadá para luchar el régimen de visitas a fin de ver crecer a su hijo, Amanda, lo ha alejado por más de 7 años, luego de que ésta lo descubriese con otro hombre en su propia casa…

programme.title: Cuidado Con Lo Que Sueñas
programme.desc: Candela, una soltera y atractiva peluquera de 40 años, Alejandro, un enamorado taxista que la espía, de 25, y Diego, un particular niño de la calle de 8 años que busca a su madre, se unirán gracias a un insólito secreto de amor escondido en la cabeza de la estatua de Bolívar colocada en la plaza.

programme.title: Expediente 53
programme.desc: Esta es una historia de misterio y acción en la ciudad de Bryan Texas el comandante Gatel pide la ayuda del FBI ya que hay muchos desaparecidos, y asesinatos en la ciudad. Los agentes Gutiérrez, Bracho y Miravalle del FBI le comentan al comandante Gatel que ellos sospechan que puede ser obra de una secta satánica y que el líder es un demonio de nombre Abal que está en el cuerpo de una bella mujer de nombre Lilly.

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.title: Sanatorio
programme.desc: Rachel y Ryan son dos influencers populares que harán cualquier cosa para conseguir algunos Me gusta más y ganar el próximo desafío virtual.

programme.title: Lucero
programme.desc: Claustrofóbica, demente y puntualmente burlona, “Lucero” no sólo es una perla del fantástico de trinchera sino la enésima prueba de la capacidad de su director para, sin apenas medios y desde los márgenes de una industria fílmica como la española actual rendida al gusto indiferenciado y a la mentalidad de cadena de montaje, generar obras sugestivas, disconformes y estridentes en el mejor sentido.

programme.title: Terror En La Sangre
programme.desc: Unas amigas que van a una fiesta que no existe y reciben un invitado sobrenatural. Un hombre camina por un estacionamiento solitario sin saber que va a encontrar algo espeluznante. Dos chicas invocan a su amiga fallecida. Una esposa que resucita, pero no regresa sola. Una casa habitada por algo que parecen fantasmas. Un hombre que engaña a la muerte. ¿Cuántas manifestaciones sobrenaturales pueden ocurrir en tu ciudad sin que te des cuenta...?

programme.title: The God Of After

programme.title: The God Of A Way

programme.title: God Wants To Show You
programme.desc: God wants to show you what’s next, but He’s waiting on you. If you want to see God’s point of view, start by slowing down and going His speed. Breakthrough happens when you let go and allow God to show you the way.

programme.title: When God Goes In
